Text: Re Wharton Recruitingso glad you want to help Ill put you down as wanting to help and Ill let you know what happens with the meeting The tentative dates are Information Session Sep Interviews Nov Reception Nov First Round on campus Nov Second Round on campus Super Saturday for Wharton folks will be the first weekend of December Ill definitely keep you posted Weve had people fly from Portland before so its definitely possible to get you out for events or interviews if your schedule allows Suzanne To Suzanne ES cc Subject Re Wharton Recruiting Suzanne Im a graduate and interested in recruiting this year However Im out in Portland so I will be unable to attenfd any meetings in Houston Let me know how I can help I would like to go out there when you go Let me know what our schedule is Thanks Bob Badeer

Re Wharton Recruitingso glad you want to help Ill put you down as wanting to help and Ill let you know what happens with the meeting The tentative dates are Information Session Sep Interviews Nov Reception Nov First Round on campus Nov Second Round on campus Super Saturday for Wharton folks will be the first weekend of December Ill definitely keep you posted Weve had people fly from Portland before so its definitely possible to get you out for events or interviews if your schedule allows Suzanne To Suzanne ES cc Subject Re Wharton Recruiting Suzanne Im a graduate and interested in recruiting this year However Im out in Portland so I will be unable to attenfd any meetings in Houston Let me know how I can help I would like to go out there when you go Let me know what our schedule is Thanks Bob Badeer

Re UPenn alumni Cc Jeff Hope all is well its been a while This is a Penn undergrad with an MBA who is looking for a position at Enron Im not sure theres anything for him here in EES but Ill ask around Would you be interested in him Suzanne Forwarded by Suzanne FarrowHOUEES on AM Howard Marx on AM To cc Subject Re UPenn alumni Suzanne I appreciate your time and consideration I am interested in an opportunity at Enron in either strategic business development or as a financial analyst Please review my attached resume in MS Word fomat Thanks Again Howard Original Message Follows From To Subject Re UPenn alumni Date Mon Aug You are welcome to email me your resume at Please indicate what type of job youre interested in pursuing Suzanne Howard Marx on PM To cc Subject UPenn alumni Dear Ms Suzanne Farrow I found your name on our UPenn alumni listing and decided to contact you directly with regards to my interest in networking with professionals After graduating from UPenn I established my own business in the pharmaceutical industry which I sold in order to attend business school I am interested in working for a leading such as Enron and would thus like to send you a copy of my resume Looking forward to hearing from you soon Howard Marx Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at Howard Marxdoc
